generated_doNotEdit.title: Surface Particle Texture Coordinate Query
generated_doNotEdit.description: Returns the texture coordinate for generating particles for the block located in the surface below the actor (scanned up to 10 blocks down) in a struct with 'u' and 'v' keys. If no actor is specified or if no surface is found, u and v will be 0.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
